type.description:
## Zombify Villager

---


[Entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/zombify_villager).

Turns a villager entity into a zombie villager.

Type ID: `apugli:zombify_villager`

---

### Example
```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "apugli:zombify_villager"
}
```
This action zombifies a villager.
